Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: BRCA1 allelic patterns were determined for four of these individuals and for 12 additional non - Ashkenazi 185delAG mutation carriers who had breast / ovarian cancer .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Breast cancer |
| Ovarian cancer |
| 185delAG mutation |

In this paragraph, the diseases mentioned are Breast cancer, Ovarian cancer, and the specific genetic mutation 185delAG.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Breast cancer |
| Ovarian cancer |
| 185delAG mutation (carriers have this mutation) |

In this paragraph, the diseases mentioned are Breast cancer and Ovarian cancer, and the entity "185delAG mutation carriers" refers to individuals who have the specific genetic mutation 185delAG. Therefore, the mutation itself is also considered a disease entity in this context.
